About AniStream

Welcome to AniStream, your favorite destination for exploring the vast world of Animes. Our mission is to provide an elegant and user-friendly interface for discovering new content, tracking trending titles, and enjoying a seamless viewing experience.

This project was built using modern web technologies to demonstrate a responsive and dynamic front-end application. We source our data from The Movie Database (TMDB) API to ensure up-to-date and accurate information.
